feedback.negative: I think this statements is NOT Check-Worthy
feedback.positive: I think this statements is Check-Worthy

footer.feedback: if you have feedback, we’d love to hear from you. Send an email to factrank@gmail.com and help fight disinformation.

made.comissioned: comissioned by Feitisj VZW, with support of Vlaams Journalistiek Fonds
made.rafael: Made with ❤️in Borgerhout by Rafael Hautekiet

features.feedback: FactRank allows users to give feedback on identified claims in order to self-improve its deep-learning model.
features.monitor: FactRank monitors the public debate for check-worthy claims using subtitles, transcripts and social media.
features.not: FactRank is not an automatic fact-checker – whether the identified claims are true or false, has to be determined by a fact-check.
features.tool: FactRank allows you to scan your own sources for claims that are factual and check-worthy, using our

landing.lead: Automatic identification of factual claims that are <u>worthy of a fact-check</u>

matching.lead: match claims that are being made to {count} already existing fact-checks
matching.title: Claim Matching

spotting.lead: real time monitor of the public debate
spotting.title: Claim Spotting

tool.429: API rate limit of {max} requests a day has been reached
tool.500: Something went wrong on our side, please try again in a while
tool.description: Try one or more staments and see whether they appear Check-Whorty to FactRank en whether they match pre-existing fact-checks.
